name: Game-o-Code
detail_description:
Round 1

Round 1 consists of Simple Quiz Test (Technologies and basic programming). PPT will be shown on projector and there will be a quizmaster for reading and explaining all questions (Technologies and basic programming)

Round 2

Round 2 will be entirely based on puzzle solving. Tokens will be earned on the basis of time completion of the puzzle (both the players will earn individually and it will be added at the end). With the total earned tokens, there will be an auction. 2 programming languages, 2 programs and extra time will be auctioned

Round 3

Round 3 is the main coding and the final round. Now with the earned language and program both the participants will have to code. Team participants’ position will be swapped after every 5 min.
rules:
Rules are:-

No cheating allowed please.
